data.name: AuthenticationDescription
data.value: Please fill the authentication details for

data.name: InsecureProtocolWarningDescription
data.value: The URL you entered is not secure. Use HTTPS connections to protect sensitive information.

data.name: EditConnectionToolTip
data.value: Edit the authentication details of the connection

data.name: InvalidTokenToolTip
data.value: The token for this connection is invalid. Edit the authentication details by clicking on the edit button.

data.name: SonarCloudDescription
data.value: A Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) tool that easily integrates into cloud DevOps platforms, extending the CI/CD workflow to systematically help you deliver good quality and secure code.

data.name: SonarQubeDescription
data.value: A self-managed tool that easily integrates into your CI/CD pipelines and DevOps platforms to systematically help you deliver good quality and secure code.

data.name: ProjectSelectionConnectionLabel
data.value: Select one of the projects from the server

data.name: SelectOrganizationLabel
data.value: Select one of your SonarQube Cloud organizations from the list or manually provide one.

data.name: BindingFailedText
data.value: Binding could not be established. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: SelectProjectToBindDescription
data.value: Select a project to bind from the chosen connection...

data.name: DeleteConnectionBindingsWarningText
data.value: These projects bindings will no longer be in connected mode!

data.name: DeleteConnectionBindingListLabel
data.value: It is used in the following project bindings:

data.name: DeleteConnectionNoProjectsLabel
data.value: It has no associated project bindings

data.name: DeleteConnectionDescription
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the connection to

data.name: ExportBindingConfigurationTooltip
data.value: Export the binding configuration to share it with your team

data.name: ValidatingConnectionFailedText
data.value: Validating the connection failed. Please see the Output window for more information.

data.name: LoadingOrganizationsFailedText
data.value: Loading the organizations from the server failed. Please see the Output window for more information.

data.name: ValidatingOrganziationSelectionFailedText
data.value: The connection is not valid for the chosen organization "{0}". Make sure the entered key matches exactly your organization's key.

data.name: FetchingBindingStatusFailedText
data.value: Binding could not be established. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: FetchingBindingStatusFailedTextProjectNotFound
data.value: Binding could not be established because Project Key could not be found. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: FetchingBindingStatusFailedTextConnectionNotFound
data.value: Binding could not be established because Server Connection could not be found. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: FetchingBindingStatusFailedTextCredentialsNotFound
data.value: Binding could not be established because Server Connection's Credentials could not be found. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: CheckingForSharedBindingFailedText
data.value: Checking for shared configuration failed. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: ConnectionAlreadyExistsText
data.value: Failed to create new connection, the connection already exists

data.name: RemovingConnectionFailedText
data.value: Removing the connection failed. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: LoadingProjectsFailedText
data.value: Loading the projects from the server failed.

data.name: LoadingProjectsFailedTextForNotFoundServerConnection
data.value: Server connection was not found. Projects could not be loaded.

data.name: NoProjectsFoundForSearchTermLabel
data.value: Your search did not match any project

data.name: UpdatingConnectionCredentialsFailedText
data.value: Failed to update the connection, please make sure that the credentials are correct.

data.name: RebindingFailedText
data.value: Failed to refresh binding, please make sure that the credentials are correct.

data.name: UnbindingFailedText
data.value: Unbinding the project failed. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: DeleteConnection_DeleteBindingFails
data.value: Removing the connection failed. The '{0}' project could not be unbound.

data.name: ManageBindingDialog_NothingToBindText
data.value: The binding status is not available. Please open a solution or a folder.

data.name: SelectSonarCloudRegionLabel
data.value: Select the SonarQube Cloud instance you would like to connect to:

data.name: GeneratingTokenFailedText
data.value: Automatic generation of a token failed. Please see the Output window for more information.

data.name: TrustConnectionDescriptionText
data.value: Connecting to SonarQube Server will enable issues to be opened directly in your IDE and enable other

data.name: TrustConnectionTokenInfoText
data.value: A token will be automatically generated to allow access to your

data.name: TrustConnectionWarningText
data.value: Always ensure that your server URL matches your SonarQube Server instance. Letting SonarQube for Visual Studio connect to an untrusted SonarQube Server is potentially dangerous.

data.name: TrustCloudConnectionDescriptionText
data.value: Connecting to SonarQube Cloud will enable issues to be opened directly in your IDE and enable other

data.name: TrustOrganizationWarningText
data.value: Ensure that the organization matches your SonarQube Cloud organization.

data.name: TrustOrganizationButton
data.value: Connect to This SonarQube Cloud Organization

data.name: TrustConnectionAddTokenFailed
data.value: Could not add token, so server connection could not be created.

data.name: ExportBindingConfigurationMessageBoxTextSuccess
data.value: SonarQube for Visual Studio saved the binding configuration to: "{0}" Please commit this file to share it with other contributors. See documentation for more info.

data.name: ExportBindingConfigurationWarningText
data.value: Failed to save the binding configuration. Please check the SonarQube for Visual Studio logs for more details.

data.name: BindingErrorTooltip
data.value: An error occured when binding to the project on the server.

data.name: ChooseAnotherProjectButton
data.value: Having trouble? Manually enter a project key

data.name: BindingSucceededText
data.value: The current project was successfully bound.

data.name: GeneratingTokenSucceededText
data.value: A token was successfully generated for the connection '{0}'.

data.name: UnbindingSucceededText
data.value: The current project was successfully unbound.

data.name: UpdatingConnectionCredentialsSucceededText
data.value: The credentials for the connection '{0}' were successfully updated.

data.name: InvalidTokenForSelectedConnectionWarningText
data.value: The token for the selected connection is invalid.

data.name: SaveCredentialsFailedText
data.value: Your token could not be saved. Please try switching the storage method to DPAPI under SonarQube > Options > Credentials storage. If the problem persists, please check the SonarQube logs or visit our community forum for further assistance.
